function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inability to prevent cascading crises in high complexity systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Barriers to preventing threats to critical infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain disruption due to shipping delays, gaps in preparedness, and logistical bottlenecks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluctuations in demand leading to fast reductions or spikes in demand for products.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on global suppliers leading to shortages of essential goods and equipment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vague definition of critical infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased vulnerability to cascading disruptions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex and transboundary crisis management","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Travel restrictions halting the flow of essential staff","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of personnel for critical infrastructure operations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obstacles in filling specialized positions due to crisis-induced delays","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of essential medical supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid shifts in the definition of critical infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interconnectedness of critical infrastructure systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific measures or laws regarding identification and protection of critical infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in understanding the notion of critical infrastructure in european union countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited protection to facilities or objects without considering dependencies or interdependencies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective cooperation among stakeholders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deficiencies in protection of critical infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of precise knowledge about upcoming pandemics and their spreading behavior","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on energy-consuming technologies and smart systems for work from home practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient emphasis on social and health aspects in building sustainability rating methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Open plan living leading to lack of private space","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of preparation for future disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper arrangement of home workspaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population trapped in their homes during the covid-19 pandemic, leading to increased demand for comfort and flexibility","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of the coronavirus through wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of attention to environmental aspects of personal protective equipment disposal","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased promotion of antimicrobial additions in building products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative psychological effects of quarantine on mental health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in housing materials","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to potential spread of viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of virus transmission via contaminated surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strain on health systems during unexpected situations like pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to visit hospitals or healthcare facilities due to lockdowns","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited involvement of architects and urban planners in response to pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited focus on the social pillar in sustainability assessment rating risks in oecd countries due to living costs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of supply chains and logistical challenges during quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to long supply paths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited
